issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "mock-secret" 4 times.
Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "mock-secret-namespace" 4 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.ns" 6 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "./test-data/example-ca-cert.pem" 7 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "domain-cluster.local-ns--secret-mock-secret" 4 times.
